sentences.en: Afterwards he would grumble to Jou - chia, " This is absurd!
sentences.cn: 他事后跟柔嘉叽咕道: “ 这不像话!

sentences.en: Around them was the grumble of half a dozen conversations.
sentences.cn: 他们周围,有五六起人在叽哩咕噜地攀谈着.

sentences.en: He could do nothing but grumble over the situation.
sentences.cn: 他除了埋怨局势之外别无他法.

sentences.en: I don't want to hear another grumble from you.
sentences.cn: 我不愿再听到你的抱怨.

sentences.en: I shouldn't grumble about Mum — she's lovely really.
sentences.cn: 我不该抱怨妈妈——她真的很好。

sentences.en: It's simply not in her nature to grumble.
sentences.cn: 怨天尤人根本就不是她的性格。

sentences.en: Jones was one of those men who grumble at everything and everybody.
sentences.cn: 有些人总是对任何事和任何人都感到不称心,琼斯就是这样的人.

sentences.en: Look! It's late. Mother will grumble again.
sentences.cn: 你瞧, 这么晚了, 妈妈又该唠叨了!

sentences.en: My grumble is with the structure and organisation of the material.
sentences.cn: 我所不满的是素材的结构和组织。

sentences.en: My only grumble is that there isn't a non-smoking section.
sentences.cn: 我惟一的抱怨是这儿没有无烟区。

sentences.en: One could often hear, far to the east, the grumble of guns.
sentences.cn: 人们经常能听到从东边很远的地方传来的隆隆枪炮声。

sentences.en: Taft grumbled that the law so favoured the criminal that trials seemed like a game of chance.
sentences.cn: 塔夫脱抱怨法律如此有利于罪犯，使得审判看来像是一场运气的游戏。

sentences.en: The students often grumble over the food.
There was a small grumble from the third row.
sentences.cn: 第三排有人低声埋怨一声.

sentences.en: They grumble about how hard they have to work.
sentences.cn: 他们抱怨自己工作得很辛苦。

sentences.en: They knitted their brows and started to grumble.
sentences.cn: 他们皱着眉头抱怨起来。

sentences.en: Why grumble at me about your own stupid mistakes?
sentences.cn: 你自己犯了愚蠢的错误,为什么向我抱怨?
威廉说: “ 别发牢骚了, 约翰. ”

words.tran_cn: 出怨言的；喃喃鸣不平的
脾气暴躁的；性情乖戾的
爱抱怨的人；发牢骚的人
脾气坏的人；爱抱怨的人

trans.tran_cn: 抱怨地表示, 嘟囔地说

trans.tran_en: If someone grumbles, they complain about something in a bad-tempered way

trans.tran_cn: 抱怨，牢骚，咕哝，（雷等的）隆隆声

trans.tran_en: to keep complaining in an unhappy way

trans.tran_cn: 抱怨，发牢骚，嘟囔，（雷等）隆隆响

trans.tran_en: to keep complaining in an unhappy way
